title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of adults, with a total of 5 data points.
Overall Share of adults has increased over the Year.
Share of adults is roughly constant from 2012 to 2008, slightly increasing from 2008 to 2002, and lastly roughly constant from 2002 to 1982.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2002.
Max Share of adults about 13.0 was recorded at Year 1982
Min Share of adults about 8.8 was recorded at Year 2012
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of adults with a total of 5 data points. The chart has one significant trend.
This trend is increasing which exists from 1982 to 2012.
